entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
